Title: Sorbet
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Jesse Alexander, Bryan Fuller
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Hettienne Park
Plot: The BAU is called in when a man is found in a hotel room bathtub with his kidney removed and Graham must determine whether this is the act of an organ harvester or if the Chesapeake Ripper ...
